name: phot_source
notes: Source of photometric data (SPOC or TESS-SPOC pipelines)

name: pl_orbeccen
notes: Planet orbital eccentricity (using a uniform prior)

name: pl_orblper
notes: Planet argument of periastron (using a uniform prior)

name: pl_orblpererr1
notes: Planet argument of periastron upper uncertainty

name: pl_orblpererr2
notes: Planet argument of periastron lower uncertainty

name: st_limbdark1err1
notes: First quadratic limb darkening parameter upper uncertainty

name: st_limbdark1err2
notes: First quadratic limb darkening parameter lower uncertainty

name: st_limbdark2err1
notes: Second quadratic limb darkening parameter upper uncertainty

name: st_limbdark2err2
notes: Second quadratic limb darkening parameter lower uncertainty

name: pl_trandurcirc
notes: Transit duration for a centrally transiting orbit (1st-to-4th contact; derived)

name: pl_trandurcircerr1
notes: Transit duration for a centrally transiting orbit upper uncertainty

name: pl_trandurcircerr2
notes: Transit duration for a centrally transiting orbit lower uncertainty

name: ttv_flag
notes: Flag indicating if TTV signal is significant (1) or insignificant (0)

name: notes-1may2023
notes: Notes from M. MacDougall (as of May 1, 2023)
